title: Places to visit in India
selftext:
Hey guys, I am looking for some suggestions for travelling to places in India. I want mostly places which can be covered over a duration of 3-4 days (basically long weekends).

It would be really helpful if you can fill in this simple form: [https://forms.gle/Qajeid5uiD9QkJj88](https://forms.gle/Qajeid5uiD9QkJj88) (30 seconds max.) so, I can have a structured data which can be referred every time I want to plan for my trip.

Thanks
comments: Not going to fill out the form but go to munnar and alleppey. I am visiting munnar for the 3rd time and I am left awestruck by how beautiful it is always. If you do end up going, I recommend taking the battery car at the eravikulam national park. It's a bit pricey but so worth
